lt4:nrccMessages.lt:message: Lines have reopened following yesterday's damage to the overhead electric wires near London Paddington. Trains may still be cancelled or delayed. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.
Due to heavy rain flooding the railway earlier today between Plymouth and Exeter St Davids trains may be cancelled, delayed or revised. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.

lt7:service.lt4:delayReason: This train has been delayed by heavy rain flooding the railway
This train has been delayed by damage to the overhead electric wires earlier today
This train has been delayed by a safety inspection of the track
This train has been delayed by a late running train being in front of this one
This train has been delayed by a fault on this train
This train has been delayed by damage to the overhead electric wires earlier today
